                                                   Position posTwo)
        Check if there is a collision between two game characters
        Parameters:
        posOne - position of the game character
        posTwo - position of the other game character
        Returns:
        true if there is collision and false otherwise

      • findPosition

        public static Position findPosition(char[][] map,
                                    char letter)
        Finds the position of some letter in the array
        Parameters:
        map - used in the game
        letter - to be searched for in the array
        Returns:
        the position of the letter, if the letter isn't found returns a default position
